actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 15(7) of the Interstate Commerce Act to permit interested persons to seek injunctive relief in certain situations where the Interstate Commerce Commission has not completed proceedings on new rate schedules within the period of the suspension of such schedule.

summary.text: Permits interested persons to seek injunctive relief in Federal district court to prohibit rate increases from becoming effective in situations where the Interstate Commerce Commission has not completed proceedings on new rate schedules within the period of the suspension of such schedule pursuant to the Interstate Commerce Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 15(7) of the Interstate Commerce Act to permit interested persons to seek injunctive relief in certain situations where the Interstate Commerce Commission has not completed proceedings on new rate schedules within the period of the suspension of such schedule.
